Package controller

Class AppointmentScreen

java.lang.Object
controller.AppointmentScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentScreen extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
A controller class for managing the appointments.
